events.name: French Diplomats Held Hostage in Niger
events.wd_label: French Diplomats Held Hostage in Niger
events.wd_description: French President Emmanuel Macron revealed that the French ambassador to Niger and other French diplomats are being held hostage at the French embassy in Niamey following the military junta's takeover.
events.description: French President Emmanuel Macron revealed that the French ambassador to Niger and other French diplomats are being held hostage at the French embassy in Niamey following the military junta's takeover.

events.name: Macron's Revelation
events.wd_description: French President Emmanuel Macron disclosed during a visit to the Cote d’Or region that the French ambassador to Niger and other diplomats are being held hostage at the French embassy.
events.description: French President Emmanuel Macron disclosed during a visit to the Cote d’Or region that the French ambassador to Niger and other diplomats are being held hostage at the French embassy.

events.name: Conditions at the Embassy
events.wd_description: Food is not being delivered to the embassy in Niamey, and the diplomats are eating military rations.
events.description: Food is not being delivered to the embassy in Niamey, and the diplomats are eating military rations.

events.name: Background of the Expulsion Order
events.wd_description: The French ambassador, Sylvian Itte, was ordered to leave Niger after the military junta seized control, but France refused to recognize the junta's authority and ordered the ambassador to remain.
events.description: The French ambassador, Sylvian Itte, was ordered to leave Niger after the military junta seized control, but France refused to recognize the junta's authority and ordered the ambassador to remain.

events.name: Macron's Response
events.wd_description: President Macron stated he is in contact with ousted President Mohamed Bazoum and will act in accordance with their discussions regarding the ambassador's situation.
events.description: President Macron stated he is in contact with ousted President Mohamed Bazoum and will act in accordance with their discussions regarding the ambassador's situation.

events.name: U.S. to Supply Ukraine with Advanced Long-Range Missiles
events.wd_label: U.S. to Supply Ukraine with Advanced Long-Range Missiles
events.wd_description: The United States plans to supply Ukraine with advanced long-range missiles, including ATACMS, to assist Kyiv in its ongoing counter-offensive against Russian forces.
events.description: The United States plans to supply Ukraine with advanced long-range missiles, including ATACMS, to assist Kyiv in its ongoing counter-offensive against Russian forces.

events.name: Announcement by President Joe Biden
events.wd_description: President Joe Biden announced plans to provide Ukraine with advanced long-range missiles after meeting with Ukrainian officials at the White House.
events.description: President Joe Biden announced plans to provide Ukraine with advanced long-range missiles after meeting with Ukrainian officials at the White House.

events.name: Details of the ATACMS Missiles
events.wd_description: Ukraine will receive ATACMS missiles, which have a range of up to 190 miles (300km), enabling them to hit Russian targets deep behind the front line.
events.description: Ukraine will receive ATACMS missiles, which have a range of up to 190 miles (300km), enabling them to hit Russian targets deep behind the front line.

events.name: Recent Ukrainian Missile Strikes
events.wd_description: On Friday, two of Ukraine’s missiles struck Russia’s Black Sea fleet headquarters using Storm Shadow missiles supplied by Britain and France.
events.description: On Friday, two of Ukraine’s missiles struck Russia’s Black Sea fleet headquarters using Storm Shadow missiles supplied by Britain and France.

events.name: New Military Aid Package
events.wd_description: Ukraine will receive a new tranche of $325 million in military aid, including artillery and ammunition, as part of the support announced by President Biden.
events.description: Ukraine will receive a new tranche of $325 million in military aid, including artillery and ammunition, as part of the support announced by President Biden.

events.name: North Korea Fires Suspected ICBM
events.wd_description: North Korea fired a suspected intercontinental ballistic missile (ICBM) that landed in Japanese waters, prompting increased joint military drills by the United States and South Korea.
events.description: North Korea fired a suspected intercontinental ballistic missile (ICBM) that landed in Japanese waters, prompting increased joint military drills by the United States and South Korea.

events.name: Missile Launch Details
events.wd_description: The suspected ICBM launched by North Korea flew for over one hour before landing in Japanese waters on Wednesday morning.
events.description: The suspected ICBM launched by North Korea flew for over one hour before landing in Japanese waters on Wednesday morning.

events.name: Response by the United States and South Korea
events.wd_label: Response by the United States and South Korea
events.wd_description: The United States and South Korea increased their joint military drills around the Korean peninsula in response to North Korea's missile launch.
events.description: The United States and South Korea increased their joint military drills around the Korean peninsula in response to North Korea's missile launch.

events.name: Emergency Meeting by South Korea
events.wd_description: South Korean President Yoon Suk-Yeol convened an emergency meeting of his national security council while attending the NATO summit in Lithuania.
events.description: South Korean President Yoon Suk-Yeol convened an emergency meeting of his national security council while attending the NATO summit in Lithuania.

events.name: U.S. Inflation Reduction Act (IRA) and EV Battery Recycling
events.wd_label: U.S. Inflation Reduction Act (IRA) and EV Battery Recycling
events.wd_description: A clause in the U.S. Inflation Reduction Act qualifies EV battery materials recycled in the U.S. as American-made for subsidies, prompting a surge in recycling efforts.
events.description: A clause in the U.S. Inflation Reduction Act qualifies EV battery materials recycled in the U.S. as American-made for subsidies, prompting a surge in recycling efforts.

events.name: Incentive for Recycled Battery Materials
events.wd_description: The IRA's clause encourages automakers to use U.S.-recycled battery materials by qualifying them for EV production incentives.
events.description: The IRA's clause encourages automakers to use U.S.-recycled battery materials by qualifying them for EV production incentives.

events.name: Impact on Recycling Industry
events.wd_description: The IRA has triggered a U.S. factory building boom, encouraging research into more recyclable batteries and influencing supply chain dynamics.
events.description: The IRA has triggered a U.S. factory building boom, encouraging research into more recyclable batteries and influencing supply chain dynamics.

events.name: t: U.S. Factory Building Boom
events.wd_description: The IRA has led to increased construction of recycling plants in the U.S., such as the New York plant by Li-Cycle and the Nevada complex by Redwood Materials.
events.description: The IRA has led to increased construction of recycling plants in the U.S., such as the New York plant by Li-Cycle and the Nevada complex by Redwood Materials.

events.name: vent: Li-Cycle New York Plant
events.wd_description: Li-Cycle is building a recycling plant in New York, supported by a $375 million U.S. government loan.
events.description: Li-Cycle is building a recycling plant in New York, supported by a $375 million U.S. government loan.

events.name: vent: Redwood Materials Nevada Complex
events.wd_description: Redwood Materials is constructing a recycling and remanufacturing complex in Nevada with a $2 billion U.S. government loan.
events.description: Redwood Materials is constructing a recycling and remanufacturing complex in Nevada with a $2 billion U.S. government loan.

events.name: t: Research and Development
events.wd_description: Automakers are investing in research to develop more recyclable batteries and efficient recycling processes.
events.description: Automakers are investing in research to develop more recyclable batteries and efficient recycling processes.

events.name: t: Supply Chain Dynamics
events.wd_description: The IRA has altered the demand equation for battery materials, encouraging the development of closed-loop supply chains.
events.description: The IRA has altered the demand equation for battery materials, encouraging the development of closed-loop supply chains.

events.name: Global Competition
events.wd_description: The U.S. efforts to recycle EV batteries are part of a broader global competition to undermine China's dominance in the field.
events.description: The U.S. efforts to recycle EV batteries are part of a broader global competition to undermine China's dominance in the field.

events.name: t: Chinese Dominance
events.wd_description: China currently handles the majority of EV battery recycling and is implementing tougher standards and increased research support for recyclers.
events.description: China currently handles the majority of EV battery recycling and is implementing tougher standards and increased research support for recyclers.

events.name: t: European Efforts
events.wd_description: European firms are planning recycling plants and focusing on mandates for minimum amounts of recycled materials in future EV batteries.
events.description: European firms are planning recycling plants and focusing on mandates for minimum amounts of recycled materials in future EV batteries.

events.name: Global EV Battery Recycling Market Growth
events.wd_label: Global EV Battery Recycling Market Growth
events.wd_description: The global market for EV battery recycling is projected to grow significantly, driven by increasing EV production and aging vehicle fleets.
events.description: The global market for EV battery recycling is projected to grow significantly, driven by increasing EV production and aging vehicle fleets.

events.name: Market Projections
events.wd_description: The EV battery recycling market is expected to grow from $11 billion in 2022 to $18 billion by 2028.
events.description: The EV battery recycling market is expected to grow from $11 billion in 2022 to $18 billion by 2028.

events.name: Technological Advancements
events.wd_description: Advances in recycling technology are improving yield rates and making recycling more efficient.
events.description: Advances in recycling technology are improving yield rates and making recycling more efficient.

events.name: t: Yield Improvement
events.wd_description: Technological advancements are increasing the yield rates of recycled materials from EV batteries, with targets close to 90-100%.
events.description: Technological advancements are increasing the yield rates of recycled materials from EV batteries, with targets close to 90-100%.

events.name: t: Local Recycling Initiatives
events.wd_description: Initiatives to keep recycling local are emerging, such as Nissan's leasing program in Japan and Nio's battery leasing model in China.
events.description: Initiatives to keep recycling local are emerging, such as Nissan's leasing program in Japan and Nio's battery leasing model in China.
